amendment.description: Amendment provides that basic grant funds authorized under the Alcohol-Impaired Driving Countermeasures section of the bill can be used for Driving While Intoxicated (DWI) Courts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 109-15 to provide that basic grant funds authorized under the Alcohol-Impaired Driving Countermeasures section can be used for Driving While Intoxicated Courts that seek to change the behavior of alcohol or drug dependent offenders arrested while driving while impaired.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Honda amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
